nodes.text: Fabrillan was the capital city of the planet Malthor. It was a hotbed of activity during the Galactic Civil War. Fabrillan also had a large population of Reigats. It had a slum area, known as Downside, where the Reigat Bakku lived. Reginna Bel Typolla worked as a docking attendant at the busy Fabrillan City Spaceport.
